result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Clerk: Britney 
Case Called: 10:35 a.m. 
**Includes 14CF438, 14CF560 & 14CF831**
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Def appears in custody with Atty Dan Cveykus.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights and Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed.
State moves to:14CF438 - DISMISS Ct.2 Operating w/PAC & DRI Ct.3 Operating while Revoked 
                           14CF560- DRI Ct.2 Bail Jumping (Felony), DRI Ct.3 Bail Jumping (Felony) & DRI Ct.4 Resisting or Obstucting and Officer 
                           14CF831- DRI Ct.1 Bail Jumping (Felony) (Repeater)
COURT GRANTS. 
PLEA: 14CF438- Ct.1 OWI 4th w/in 5 yrs>> NO CONTEST 
           14CF560- Ct.1 Bail Jumping (Felony)>> NO CONTEST                            
COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made: a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: SWH 3 years probation on Ct.1 in 14CF438, SWH 2 years probation on Ct.1 14CF560, concurrent. CONDITIONS: 1 year MCJ with huber for work and treatment if defendant qualifies under jail classification, credit for 14 days, $1000.00 fine plus CC, asssessment, treatment and counseling as deemed appropriate by agent, driving with care program, 36 month DL revocation with credit for time admin suspended, any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name are subject to IID for 36 months, as is the defendant himself, AODA, 6 points on DL and absolute sobriety. 
Voter Ineligibility Notice & Acknowledgment signed and filed. 
Adj: 10:52 a.m.
Plea hearing on January 9, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Plea hearing on February 13, 2015 at 09:15 am.
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection

Clerk Shirley
Case called: 10:16
Includes: 14CF438, 14CF560 and 14CF831
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig, Defendant appears in custody with Atty Daniel Cveykus.

State is requesting to leave bail as set.

of Preliminary Examination

Case called: 10:02am.  Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Dan Cveykus. Waiver of Prelim. filed.  Court questions deft as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial. State moves for 30 days to file Information - crt grants. Bond to Continue.  DATES: Bail Bond Hearing 9/25/14 @ 10:15am BR 1. C: Br. 1. Adjourned: 10:04am.
Defendant's motion for reduction of bail (stj)
Bail/bond hearing on September 25, 2014 at 10:15 am.

Case called: 11:11am. Clerk: Denise. Dft. Appears prose, sworn & testifies. Court questions Dft. RE: Employment/Income. Defendant states he does not qualify due to income; still working right now. Atty Dan Cveykus representing him on another matter. Court appts Atty Dan Cveykus @ $70/hr. not to exceed $700.00 w/o further order of the Court.  Crt includes this matter with pending case. C: Br. 1. Adjourned: 11:14am.

INCLUDES 14CF831, 14CF560, & 14CF438 *money already posted in 14CF438* Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 for Day report program within 1 business day of release. Absolute sobriety. No bars, taverns, liquor stores, or beer tents.   Shall not consume alcohol.
